transArray.content: The location is excellent, the environment is good, the service is good, there is a small refrigerator in the room, and the pillows are very comfortable. The guys and girls at the front desk are very nice.

Hello dear guests, it is full of love that warms the hearts of Orange people. Although the encounter is short, the memories are eternal. I hope you will look back and be in a good mood every day! We will continue to work hard to live up to your trust! All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life and smooth work! Manager: Zhang Minghui
